Ruby.en: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses throughout Beldum's body. This Pokémon communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.

Sapphire.en: Beldum keeps itself floating by generating a magnetic force that repels earth's natural magnetism. When it sleeps, this Pokémon anchors itself to a cliff using the hooks on its rear.

Emerald.en: When Beldum gather in a swarm, they move in perfect unison as if they were but one Pokémon. They communicate with each other using brain waves.

FireRed.en: It uses magnetic waves to converse with its kind. All the cells in its body are magnetic.

LeafGreen.en: It uses magnetic waves to converse with its kind. All the cells in its body are magnetic.

Diamond.en: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

Pearl.en: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

Platinum.en: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

HeartGold.en: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground's natural magnetism, letting it float.

SoulSilver.en: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground's natural magnetism, letting it float.

Black.en: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

White.en: It converses with others by using magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

Black 2.en: Its cells are all magnetic, and it communicates with others by using magnetic pulses.

White 2.en: Its cells are all magnetic, and it communicates with others by using magnetic pulses.

X.en: The magnetic force generated by its body repels the ground's natural magnetism, letting it float.

Y.en: It converses with others by magnetic pulses. In a swarm, they move in perfect unison.

Omega Ruby.en: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses through Beldum's body. This Pokémon communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.

Alpha Sapphire.en: Beldum keeps itself floating by generating a magnetic force that repels earth's natural magnetism. When it sleeps, this Pokémon anchors itself to a cliff using the hooks on its rear.

Sun.en: Its cells are all magnets. It uses magnetism to communicate with others of its kind.

Moon.en: With magnetic traction, it pulls its opponents in close. When they're in range, it slashes them with its rear claws.
